languages.text: "По завету Зари! Заря есть великий пророк и великий воин. Лицо его скрыто, но взгляд пронзает пелену времени и зрит будущее! Я всегда знал, что от нас скрывают истину, и вот дождался — пророк явился на Райкад Минорис и открыл нам глаза! Грядет конец мира — Последний восход. И только те, кто примут правду Зари, смогут его пережить!"

"At Aurora's behest! Aurora is a great prophet and a great warrior. Their face is shrouded, but their gaze pierces the veil of time and sees into the future! I always knew the governor's dogs were hiding the truth from us, and now, the day has come: a prophet has come to Rykad Minoris and opened our eyes! The end of the world is coming — the Final Dawn. And only those who accept Aurora's truth will survive it!"
languages.original_text: "По завету Зари! Заря есть великий пророк и великий воин. Лицо его скрыто, но взгляд пронзает пелену времени и зрит будущее! Я всегда знал, что от нас скрывают истину, и вот дождался — пророк явился на Райкад Минорис и открыл нам глаза! Грядет конец мира — Последний восход. И только те, кто примут правду Зари, смогут его пережить!"

traits.locale_text: "At Aurora's behest! Aurora is a great prophet and a great warrior. His face is hidden, but his gaze pierces the veil of time and sees into the future! I always knew they were hiding the truth from us, and my hopes have been fulfilled: a prophet has come to Rykad Minoris and opened our eyes! The end of the world is coming: the Final Dawn. And only those who accept Aurora's truth will survive it!"

"At Aurora's behest! Aurora is a great prophet and a great warrior. His face is hidden, but his gaze pierces the veil of time and sees into the future! I always knew they were hiding the truth from us, and my hopes have been fulfilled: a prophet has come to Rykad Minoris and opened our eyes! The end of the world is coming: the Final Dawn. And only those who accept Aurora's truth will survive it!"

"At Aurora's behest! Aurora is a great prophet and a great warrior. Their face is shrouded, but their gaze pierces the veil of time and sees into the future! I always knew the governor's dogs were hiding the truth from us, and now, the day has come: a prophet has come to Rykad Minoris and opened our eyes! The end of the world is coming — the Final Dawn. And only those who accept Aurora's truth will survive it!"

languages.text: "Auf Auroras Geheiß! Aurora ist ein großer Prophet und ein großer Krieger. Das Gesicht ist verschleiert, doch der Blick durchbohrt den Schleier der Zeit und sieht in die Zukunft! Ich wusste immer, dass die Hunde des Gouverneurs die Wahrheit vor uns verbergen, und nun ist der Tag gekommen: Ein Prophet ist nach Rykad Minoris gekommen und hat uns die Augen geöffnet! Das Ende der Welt naht — die letzte Dämmerung. Und nur, wer Auroras Wahrheit annimmt, wird überleben!"
languages.original_text: "At Aurora's behest! Aurora is a great prophet and a great warrior. Their face is shrouded, but their gaze pierces the veil of time and sees into the future! I always knew the governor's dogs were hiding the truth from us, and now, the day has come: a prophet has come to Rykad Minoris and opened our eyes! The end of the world is coming — the Final Dawn. And only those who accept Aurora's truth will survive it!"

traits.locale_text: "Auf Auroras Geheiß! Aurora ist ein großer Prophet und ein großer Krieger. Sein Gesicht ist verschleiert, doch sein Blick durchbohrt den Schleier der Zeit und sieht in die Zukunft! Ich wusste immer, dass sie die Wahrheit vor uns verbergen, und nun ist der Tag gekommen: Ein Prophet ist nach Rykad Minoris gekommen und hat uns die Augen geöffnet! Das Ende der Welt naht — die letzte Dämmerung. Und nur, wer Auroras Wahrheit annimmt, wird überleben!"

languages.text: « J'agis sur ordre d'Aurore ! Aurore est une grande prophétesse et une grande guerrière. Elle dissimule son visage, mais son regard transperce le voile du temps pour voir l'avenir ! J'ai toujours su que les chiens du gouverneur nous cachaient la vérité, et maintenant, le jour est venu : une prophétesse est venue sur Rykad Minoris et nous a ouvert les yeux ! La fin du monde approche : l'Aube finale. Et seuls ceux qui accepteront la vérité d'Aurore y survivront ! »
languages.original_text: "At Aurora's behest! Aurora is a great prophet and a great warrior. Their face is shrouded, but their gaze pierces the veil of time and sees into the future! I always knew the governor's dogs were hiding the truth from us, and now, the day has come: a prophet has come to Rykad Minoris and opened our eyes! The end of the world is coming — the Final Dawn. And only those who accept Aurora's truth will survive it!"

traits.locale_text: « J'agis sur ordre d'Aurore ! Aurore est une grande prophétesse et une grande guerrière. Elle dissimule son visage, mais son regard transperce le voile du temps pour voir l'avenir ! J'ai toujours su que les chiens du gouverneur nous cachaient la vérité, et maintenant, le jour est venu : une prophétesse est venue sur Rykad Minoris et nous a ouvert les yeux ! La fin du monde approche : l'Aube finale. Et seuls ceux qui accepteront la vérité d'Aurore y survivront ! »

languages.text: “遵从‘极光’的教导！这位大人是伟大的先知，伟大的战士。尽管大人的脸罩在面具之下，但大人的目光可以穿透时间的面纱，看到未来！我早就知道，政府的那些走狗一直在对我们隐瞒真相，而如今，这一天终于来了！一位先知来到小莱卡德，打开了我们的盲眼！终末黎明——这个世界的末日即将到来，只有那些相信‘极光’，接受真理的人才能活下来！”
languages.original_text: "At Aurora's behest! Aurora is a great prophet and a great warrior. Their face is shrouded, but their gaze pierces the veil of time and sees into the future! I always knew the governor's dogs were hiding the truth from us, and now, the day has come: a prophet has come to Rykad Minoris and opened our eyes! The end of the world is coming — the Final Dawn. And only those who accept Aurora's truth will survive it!"

traits.locale_text: “遵从‘极光’的教导！他是伟大的先知，伟大的战士。尽管他的脸罩在面具之下，但他的目光可以穿透时间的面纱，看到未来！我早就知道，那些人一直在对我们隐瞒真相，而如今，这一天终于来了！一位先知来到小莱卡德，打开了我们的盲眼！终末黎明——这个世界的末日即将到来，只有那些相信‘极光’，接受真理的人才能活下来！”

languages.text: 「オーロラの命じるままに！オーロラは偉大な予言者であり、偉大な戦士。彼らの顔は覆われているが、そのまなざしは時のヴェールを貫き、未来を見通す！私は常に総督の犬どもが真実を隠していると知っている。そして今、その日が来た。予言者がライカド・ミノリスに現れ、私たちの目を開いたのです！世界の終焉は訪れる。最後の夜明けだ。そしてオーロラの真実を受け入れる者だけがそれを乗り越えられる！」
languages.original_text: "At Aurora's behest! Aurora is a great prophet and a great warrior. Their face is shrouded, but their gaze pierces the veil of time and sees into the future! I always knew the governor's dogs were hiding the truth from us, and now, the day has come: a prophet has come to Rykad Minoris and opened our eyes! The end of the world is coming — the Final Dawn. And only those who accept Aurora's truth will survive it!"

traits.locale_text: 「オーロラの命じるままに！オーロラは偉大な予言者であり、偉大な戦士。彼の顔は覆われているが、そのまなざしは時のヴェールを貫き、未来を見通す！私は常に彼らが真実を隠していると知っている。そして今、その日が来た。予言者がライカド・ミノリスに現れ、私たちの目を開いたのです！世界の終焉は訪れる。最後の夜明けだ。そしてオーロラの真実を受け入れる者だけがそれを乗り越えられる！」

languages.text: «¡Es la voluntad de Aurora! Aurora es una gran profeta y una gran guerrera. Su rostro está oculto, pero su mirada atraviesa el velo del tiempo y ve el futuro. Siempre supe que los perros del gobernador nos ocultaban la verdad, y ahora, ha llegado el día: ¡una profeta ha venido a Rykad Minoris y nos ha abierto los ojos! Se acerca el fin del mundo: el Amanecer Final. Y solo aquellos que acepten la verdad de Aurora sobrevivirán a ello».
languages.original_text: "At Aurora's behest! Aurora is a great prophet and a great warrior. Their face is shrouded, but their gaze pierces the veil of time and sees into the future! I always knew the governor's dogs were hiding the truth from us, and now, the day has come: a prophet has come to Rykad Minoris and opened our eyes! The end of the world is coming — the Final Dawn. And only those who accept Aurora's truth will survive it!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Es la voluntad de Aurora! Aurora es una gran profeta y una gran guerrera. Su rostro está oculto, pero su mirada atraviesa el velo del tiempo y ve el futuro. Siempre supe que nos ocultaban la verdad, y ahora, ha llegado el día: ¡una profeta ha venido a Rykad Minoris y nos ha abierto los ojos! Se acerca el fin del mundo: el Amanecer Final. Y solo aquellos que acepten la verdad de Aurora sobrevivirán a ello».

languages.text: "Aurora'ya niyaz ederiz! Aurora, büyük bir peygamber ve büyük bir savaşçıdır. Yüzü örtülü olsa da bakışları zamanın perdesini deler ve geleceği görür! Valinin köpeklerinin gerçeği bizden sakladığını hep biliyordum. Bugünü bekliyorduk, Rykad Minoris'e bir peygamber geldi ve gözlerimizi açtı! Dünyanın sonu, Nihai Şafak geliyor ve sadece Aurora'nın hakikatini kabul edenler sağ kalacak!"
languages.original_text: "At Aurora's behest! Aurora is a great prophet and a great warrior. Their face is shrouded, but their gaze pierces the veil of time and sees into the future! I always knew the governor's dogs were hiding the truth from us, and now, the day has come: a prophet has come to Rykad Minoris and opened our eyes! The end of the world is coming — the Final Dawn. And only those who accept Aurora's truth will survive it!"
